content:
Dock Enum

Definition

Specifies the Dock position of a child element that is inside a anel.

In this Article

public enum Dock
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
Dock

Remarks

If you set the anel.LastChildFill property to true, which is the default setting, the last child element of a anel always fills the remaining space, regardless of any other dock value that you set on the last child element. To dock a child in another direction, you must set the anel.LastChildFill property to false and must also set an explicit dock direction on the last child element.

Fields

Bottom

A child element that is positioned at the bottom of the anel.
Left

A child element that is positioned on the left side of the anel.
Right

A child element that is positioned on the right side of the anel.
Top

A child element that is positioned at the top of the anel.
